title: Got honor 5 yesterday after 2 years
body: Took 2 years of on/off playing. Never got a punishment. Hope for some new rewards for the honor system with the lvl 5 tokens and idk if I'll get 2 more tokens in 2 days when the new season starts (you are supposed to get 2 tokens every season, but I don't know if I got it too late).

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Troll Slaiyer,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=fhAWiV3W,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2020-01-08T22:19:21.229+0000)
>
> honor means nothing

It means you don't create a toxic game whenever you play.

I am Honor 4, which is a new high for me. I was pretty shocked at how little I got from it, some key fragments and a capsule with nothing exciting in it. I might get Honor 5 at some point, but I'm sure the rewards will be just as dull.

Considering how toxic this game is, I think Honor 5 should have a lot more flair to it. A unique, permanent loading screen boarder that says to the world I'm Honor 5

> [{quoted}](name=zPOOPz,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=fhAWiV3W,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2020-01-08T20:37:10.156+0000)
>
> what 2 tokens?

The honor level 5 tokens. Currently, you can use them to unlock a honor twitch skin + champ or grey warwick + champ. There is also a border for each champion. So 4 tokens for all 4 things (1 each).

I'm still not sure what 2 tokens you are talking about.  Do you mean the big honor 5 capsule?

I don't care enough to open mine so I don't know what's in it.  I still have 5 honor capsule from 2017 when honor system first came out that I haven't even opened lol.

https://i.imgur.com/hNUMfVO.png

> [{quoted}](name=zPOOPz,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=fhAWiV3W,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2020-01-08T20:50:54.905+0000)

https://imgur.com/a/NGmKQ86
That's weird.  I don't have those for any season even though I've been honor 5 for the past 3 seasons.  Should I submit a support ticket?

> [{quoted}](name=zPOOPz,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=fhAWiV3W,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2020-01-08T21:18:17.260+0000)
>
> That's weird.  I don't have those for any season even though I've been honor 5 for the past 3 seasons.  Should I submit a support ticket?

You should asap it resets when the new season starts so in like 2 days its really weird you dint got them though if you made it to honor lvl 5 you should had got the tokens.

> [{quoted}](name=zPOOPz,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=fhAWiV3W,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2020-01-08T21:18:17.260+0000)
>

I probably would. You should have gotten some.
everyone could get Honor 5 it so easy to get all you have to do is not be toxic.

> [{quoted}](name=Kroda13,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=fhAWiV3W,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2020-01-08T21:21:34.925+0000)

4head
YEAH you did! Nicely done dude

Are you asking if you'll get 2 tokens? Or saying honor 5 should be more rewarding?
I don't see a topic otherwise.

> [{quoted}](name=Nightsky Pirate,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=fhAWiV3W,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2020-01-08T20:36:36.400+0000)
>
> Are you asking if you'll get 2 tokens? Or saying honor 5 should be more rewarding?
> I don't see a topic otherwise.

Just posting that I got it and to perhaps inspire other people. It's nice to have talks. Asking a question just for the heck of it, not that I really mind.
Tote the honor proudly then, sounds like you earned it.
